name: Zenon Traveler
description:
Late 2002/early 2003 this Action Space Shooter called Zenon Traveler was created by me using Clickteam The Games Factory. I was in high school at the time and only had access to the internet through a 56k dial up modem.

I do not have any project files left but i still love the music of this game and its fun to play even today. Thats why i have made it possible to download even as the game is not and never will be finished.

Including in the game:

  • 4 finished levels with a boss.
  • 2 unifinished levels.
  • 3 Sounds tracks.
  • 7 power ups (weapon power up is randomly changing weapon type (red - low lvl, yellow - mid level, green - high level))
  • 2 Player local co-op support
  • Save and load progress.

! The game was created when windows still was shiny user interface on top of DOS. This game needs to be played in compability mode (Windows 98 / Windows ME).
